title: Key Legal Updates in February 2021
summary: The newsletter covers several key legal updates, including budget bills affecting EMS and fire districts, revisitation of public duty rules with a case example, changes to EMS regulations, and concerns regarding public discussions under the Open Government Act.
compressed_content: 1. 2021 Legislative Bills: Impact on EMS and Fire Districts 2. Public Duty Doctrine Revisited: Case Example 3. EMS Regulations Updated 4. OPMA Concerns for Public Discussions
search_text: February 2021, Firehouse Lawyer, Volume 19, Number 2, LEGISLATIVE BILLS OF INTEREST, Special Relationship Rules, Note on OPMA Issue, Access and Subscribe at: firehouselawyer.com, Inside this Issue.
